comments.start: Use 'npm start' to run the backend server locally for testing.
comments.dev: Use 'npm run dev' to run the frontend development server with Vite.
comments.build: IMPORTANT: Run 'npm run build' to compile and bundle the extension into the '/dist' folder.

scripts.build:chrome: npm run clean && cpy manifest.chrome.json public/ --rename=manifest.json && vite build
scripts.build:firefox: npm run clean && cpy manifest.firefox.json public/ --rename=manifest.json && vite build
